name: Styx (CodyHadden)
description:
Group project created by

Nikhil - https://nikhil-naidu.itch.io/

Cody - https://codyhadden.itch.io/

This game was created with the brief of "Mythology, Gore and Enemy" as well as using having to use a single input. With these brief we came up with the idea of the player needing to traverse over a blood filled lake by jumping from different boats and avoiding the water below.

Based on Greek mythology, Where you play as a spirt who has fallen of charons boat and now you must journey through the river styx in order to get eternal rest or be dragged down to the depths of the river by the spirits of the damned

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Move Character
